## ServiceUnavailableInterceptor class

ServiceUnavailableInterceptor used for intercepting http responses and handling 503 statuses

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ServiceUnavailableInterceptor implements HttpInterceptor 
```
<b>Implements:</b> HttpInterceptor
